basic_info.description: My Name is Martin Hansen. I have grown up with an infatuation with technology and have always had a knack for it. My past jobs have required me to have precision and a good attention to detail namely my job as a butcher and lamp repair technician. I work great in teams and am excited to pursue a career as a full-stack software Dev

projects.title: Cookie Stand
projects.description: One of the first larger projects that I worked on in my Code Fellows class. This website gives the owners sales projections for the day.

projects.title: Code 301 project
projects.description: Final project for code fellows 301 class, info to be updated.

projects.title: Farm Word Guessing Game
projects.description: A word guessing game similar to wordle with a complicating twist instead of showing you that the letter that is correct it'll display a pig on the left side and if the letter is in the correct spot it'll show a bull on the right side. This application allow the user to input a 5 letter word and then display the pigs and bulls associated with given guessed word. And then when the word is finally guessed the user will be notified.
